title.@value: Events resulting in loss of self-esteem in childhood

definition.@value: Events resulting in a negative self-reappraisal by the child such as failure in tasks with high personal investment; disclosure or discovery of a shameful or stigmatizing personal or family event; or other humiliating experiences.

label.@value: Events resulting in loss of self-esteem in childhood
problem of negative life events in childhood of loss of self-esteem
